name: 3D Maze Mayhem
description:
INSTRUCTIONS ON HOW TO PLAY THE GAME: 

You are playing from a first-person perspective and your goal is to complete the maze and collect the most coins in the process. 

The end of the maze is indicated by a green pillar object and once you go through it the game is over. 

You use the left joy stick (horizontal and vertical axes) to control your movement. Pushing the joy stick up moves you forward, down move you back, 

left moves you left, and right moves you right. The right joy stick is used for rotation. If you want to look to your left, move the joy stick left, 

and if you want to look right, move the joy stick to the right. 

Each coin is worth 1 point. There are many dead ends to the maze so it is your job to figure out the right path, even if it takes a few tries! 

Credit for objects used in my game:
